channel.title: Black Mesa vs Half Life Graphical Comparison
channel.description:
I made a video on my Youtube Channel. To show the difference between the 2 games. Half Life from 1998 and Black Mesa Source 2012
Here is the Link [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DFbH-hqhC-k[/url]
There will be more soon, possibly a gun comparison between the 2 games

item.title: Black Mesa vs Half Life Graphical Comparison
item.dc:creator: tomdemko
item.description:
Devavres:

Might I suggest a comparison of HL Source and BM? It seems fairer and more apt a contrast.

Was a good idea until you typed the second sentence.

Read full topic
